item.title: Prepare Repository
item.summary: Start working with git repository

item.title: Initialize Repository
item.summary: Create new empty repository on current directory

item.title: Clone Repository
item.summary: Clone repository from URL

item.title: Configuration
item.summary: Before start working with repository, it should properly configured

item.title: Show Configuration
item.summary: Show current configuration

item.title: Set User Name
item.summary: Set commiter user name

item.title: Set User Email
item.summary: Set commiter email address

item.title: Unix/Windows EOL Conversion
item.summary: Automatically convert between Unix and Windows end of line on commit and checkout

item.title: Configuration Scope
item.summary: --local or none for current repo, --global for user scope, --system for system scope

item.title: Working With Repository
item.summary: Adding files, commiting changes

item.title: Show Status
item.summary: Show current directory status, what files changed

item.title: Add File
item.summary: Add file or directory to the index for the next commit

item.title: Commit Change
item.summary: Apply the change in the index to the repository

item.title: Revise Commit
item.summary: Replace last commit with current index

item.title: Manage Branch
item.summary: Create, merge, delete branch

item.title: Create New Branch
item.summary: Create new branch based on current branch

item.title: Change Branch
item.summary: Change active branch

item.title: List Branch
item.summary: List available branches

item.title: Delete Branch
item.summary: Delete already merged branches

item.title: Force Delete Branch
item.summary: Delete branch, even unmerged. Use with caution

item.title: Merge Branch
item.summary: Merge other branch with current branch, fast-forward if possible

item.title: Merge With Merge Commit
item.summary: Merge other branch with merge commit

item.title: Manage Remote
item.summary: Synchronize local and remote repository

item.title: Show remote repositories
item.summary: Show current remote repositories name and url for push/fetch

item.title: Add Remote Repository
item.summary: Add new remote url repository with given name

item.title: Push Branch To Remote
item.summary: Push local branch to remote repository

item.title: Manage Tags
item.summary: Manage local and remote tags

item.title: List Local Tag
item.summary: List local tags

item.title: Add Local Tag
item.summary: Add tag to the local repository

item.title: Delete Local Tag
item.summary: Delete a tag from local repository

item.title: Push Single Tag To Remote
item.summary: Push single local tag to remote repository

item.title: Push All Tag
item.summary: Push all local tags to remote repository

item.title: Delete Remote Tag
item.summary: Delete a tag from remote repository
